name: Nosy Little Fly
description:
A challenge like nothing else!
Accelerating, making turns and stopping are all done by controlling the torque of your character. It can be difficult at first, but very rewarding to master. Before you know it, you'll be zipping through the levels like nothing else!

Key Features:

| Physics-based movement with no gravity

| Cute characters and gorgeous 2D environments

| 40+ Levels with secret collectables

| Unlockable cosmetics to customize the fly according to your vibes

| 5+ characters with unique skills to adapt your play-style

| An unique soundtrack inspired by 64 bit era platformers

Nosy Little Fly is different to most side scrollers. It is a challenge to hardcore 2D gamers to master. Don't let the cute graphics fool you.
Are you up to the task?
